title: Bug 112458 - Property Editor still shows the properties of layout items when switch to Master page viewer.
description: Bug 112458Property Editor still shows the properties of layout items when switch to Master page viewer. Description: Property Editor still shows the properties of layout items when switch to Master page viewer. Steps to reproduce: 1.
OB: When switching to the Master Page viewer, the Property Editor continues to display the properties of the layout items. Specifically, it still shows the properties of the label.
EB: When switching to the Master Page viewer, the Property Editor should change to reflect the properties of the Master Page, and not show the properties of the layout items like the label.
SR: To reproduce: 1. Create a new report and insert a label. 2. Select the label. (Property Editor shows label's properties) 3. Switch to the Master Page viewer.
